product_name: Pro-Tec Athletics Toe Caps - Package of 4
long_description: Protect and cushion your tootsies and toenails with Toe Caps by Pro-Tec Athletics(R)-perfect for running, hiking and other sports. Made from custom grade silicone, they help protect toes from blisters, rubbing, irritation and toenail loss. Toe Caps serve as a cushion by protecting toes from direct contact with inside of shoes. Caps also absorb stress to the toe area for further protection. One size fits most; Toe Cap length can be easily cut down to fit smaller toes. Package contains four Toe Caps.
short_description: Protect and cushion your tootsies and toenails with Toe Caps by Pro-Tec Athletics(R)-perfect for running, hiking and other sports.
